content.name: p
children: We would love your input! We want to make contributing to this project as easy and transparent as possible, whether it's:

children.name: li
children: Discussing the current state of the documentation

children.name: li
children: Proposing new sections to the documentation or features to the documentation site

children.name: li
children: Create a feature branch off of develop

children.name: li
children: Create a PR from your repo's feature branch to this repositories develop branch

children.name: p
children: naming of branches should follow the convention of
is a descriptive name of the work being done.

children.name: p
children: If a branch addresses and open issue, branch naming should include the issue number it is addressing. For example
would indicate that there is an open issue numbered 1, the issue describes a short coming in the search functionality of the documentation and your submission fixs that issue.

frontmatter.title: Contributing, a how-to
frontmatter.description: A discussion on how to get involved.
